title: The premium so collected by the Authority shall be primarily used for development of offsite infrastructure required for the Biotechnology Parks
clause_text: The premium so collected by the Authority shall be primarily used for development of offsite infrastructure required for the Biotechnology Parks.
section: Additional FSI to Biotechnology Units / Park
